module.name: FreePBX Framework

should be : disabled in advanced settings *14.0.13.34* bump *14.0.13.33* FREEI-1430 Adding 'ignorecache' fwconsole command to ignore cache while updating module *14.0.13.32* FREEI-1325 FastAGI setting not using FastAGI in dialplan *14.0.13.31* FREEPBX-21435 - Module update email never includes line "Automatic updates are enabled!" *14.0.13.30* FREPEBX-21321 Replacing 'installall' with 'upgradeall' for auto-update *14.0.13.29* FREEPBX-21405 : Send update email when auto_module_updates = 'emailonly' *14.0.13.28* FREEI-1401 *14.0.13.27* FREEI-1377 *14.0.13.26* FREEPBX-20558 Installation with Asterisk 17 Fails *14.0.13.25* FREEI-1270 Add Asterisk 17 support with FreePBX *14.0.13.24* FREEI-1073 *14.0.13.23* Add new GPG keys, so we can begin to address issues with broken keyservers. *14.0.13.22* FREEI-999 *14.0.13.21* FREEPBX-20892 Don't use http_build_query, it URL-encodes strings *14.0.13.20* bump *14.0.13.19* FREEI-906 Module upgrade failed with error : Request-URI Too Long *14.0.13.18* FREEI-1017 *14.0.13.17* FREEI-918: display an error if uploaded module file's size is too large *14.0.13.16* FREEPBX-20899 *14.0.13.15* FREEPBX-20717: fixing a namespace issue for fwconsole validate *14.0.13.14* FREEI-976 Check for AAC support in ffmpeg *14.0.13.13* FREEI-713 Expiring cert for openvpn *14.0.13.12* FREEPBX-20791 *14.0.13.9* bump *14.0.13.8* Revert FREEPBX-20441 *14.0.13.7* FREEPBX-20441 FreePBX 13 to SNG7 update breaks calling *14.0.13.6* FREEI-686 Recent Framework changes introduce delay with scheduled pages *14.0.13.5* FREEPBX-20496 Apache errors when browsing Admin GUI *14.0.13.4* FREEPBX-20002 - make fwconsole cronjob compatible with Debian *14.0.13.3* FREEI-556 FREEI-567 - wait up to 30 seconds for Asterisk to be ready during a start/restart *14.0.13.2* FREEPBX-19993 *14.0.13.1* FREEI-522 ony variables should be passed by reference *14.0.13* Actually set the day in System Updates FREEPBX-16969 *14.0.12.13* Better inserting of jobs *14.0.12.12* Enable or Disable crons based on module state *14.0.12.11* Add rawname to console warning messages *14.0.12.10* Check with core for status of FastAGI and PM2 *14.0.12.9* Declare correct const when using syslog *14.0.12.8* Add locking trait to jobs cli *14.0.12.7* FREEPBX-19930 *14.0.12.6* Expose 'html5Formats' array from Media *14.0.12.4* FREEPBX-19909 *14.0.12.3* FREEPBX-19601 *14.0.12.2* FREEPBX-19878 *14.0.12.1* Small fixes for job class *14.0.12* Add centralized job class *14.0.11.1* FREEPBX-19827 *14.0.11* Update locking code in system updates *14.0.10.4* Add ability to forcefully define a codec *14.0.10.3* FREEPBX-19806 *14.0.10.2* FREEPBX-19756 *14.0.10.1* FREEPBX-19733 *14.0.10* FREEPBX-19620 gpg keys refresh failed *14.0.9.1* FREEPBX-19788 *14.0.9* FREEPBX-19762 *14.0.8.4* FREEPBX-19775 *14.0.8.3* FREEPBX-19767 Invalid parameter number *14.0.8.2* FREEI-478 declare AUTH for inital OOBE setup *14.0.8.1* Remove use outside of scope *14.0.8* Lazy load console commands for performance improvements *14.0.7.7* FREEI-468 *14.0.7.6* FREEPBX-19561 *14.0.7.5* FREEPBX-19619 *14.0.7.4* Set empty array for each table *14.0.7.3* FREEPBX-19493 *14.0.7.2* FREEPBX-19494 *14.0.7.1* Remove Module Admin locking *14.0.7* Fixing FREEPBX-12959 *14.0.6* Implement kvstore caching *14.0.5.27* Change drop table to delete from in framework kvstore *14.0.5.27* FREEPBX-19003 *14.0.5.26* FREEPBX-18910 *14.0.5.25* No longer reload system after framework upgrades. module.description: This module provides a facility to install bug fixes to the framework code that is not otherwise housed in a module
